Atares Amplifier NET W 2W 3 Artifact - Vehicle 1 Whenever Atares Amplifier is crewed by a creature with flying, it gains flying until end of turn. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, prowess, trample, and vigilance. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
Cymurai Blademaster NET W 1WW 3 Artifact Creature - Construct Samurai 2/2 2 Double strike Superiority — At the beginning of combat on your turn, Cymurai Blademaster gains indestructible until end of turn if you have more life than an opponent.

Each player who controls the most permanents of that type sacrifices one of them. [-7]: Create three 3/3 colorless Construct artifact creature tokens named Equalizer with “Players can’t cast more than one spell each turn” and “When this creature dies, each player draws a card.”
Liberated Armory NET W 2W 3 Enchantment 1 Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, arm it. Martial Dictate NET W XWW 2 Sorcery 3 Create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. You gain X life.
New World Order NET W 4WW 6 Sorcery 3 Exchange life totals with target player.
Taken for Questioning NET W 1WW 3 Enchantment 1 Superiority — As long as you have more life than an opponent, you may cast Taken for Questioning as though it had flash. When Taken for Questioning enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Taken for Questioning leaves the battlefield.
Theos Artene, Demagogue NET W 1W 2 Legendary Creature - Human Advisor 1/1 2 Lifelink If you would gain life, you gain twice that much life instead. As long as your life total is at least twice the life total of an opponent, Theos Artene, Demagogue gets +4/+4.
Wrath of Mod NET W 2WW 4 Sorcery 3 Each player chooses a creature they control and uploads it. Then destroy all creatures. (To upload a card, exile it. Its owner may pay 2 to return it to their hand any time they could cast a sorcery.)

Back Door NET U XU 1 Sorcery 3 Choose target instant or sorcery card in a graveyard with mana value X or less. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. If that card would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

Corporate Ascension NET U 2U 3 Enchantment 1 At the beginning of your upkeep, upload the top card of your library. (To upload a card, exile it. Its owner may pay 2 to return it to their hand any time they could cast a sorcery.) Whenever you put an uploaded card into your hand, put a profit counter on Corporate Ascension. At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are ten or more profit counters on Corporate Ascension, you win the game.
